mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.money AS "money", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", sm.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_with_draw( id, money, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{money}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
